channel.title: [FM] FoL Community Forum Mafia - Pug Victory! Who the hell let the dogs out?
channel.description:
# [color=orange]FoL Community Forum Mafia[/color]
<Small>Hosted by Marl and @eevee! </small>
# [color=orange]What's different?[/color]
All roles are custom made by myself and Eevee, and each card is based around one of the many users on this forum! You might even get lucky and roll yourself! The general power level of this is higher than ToL, so don't be afraid if you see a couple of busted classes.
In addition to this, occasionally myself or Eevee will host a special event.
Keep in mind, this isn't meant to be a competetive setup - It's more of meant to be high-powered role madness.
There will be the standard 3 factions - Town, Mafia and Neutrals. No neutrals will have the fool/jester win condition.
# [color=darkorange]Rules[/color] Standard Forum Rules Apply Days are 48 Hours, Nights are 24 Hours. Don't angleshoot ( :eyes: @Margaret ) Don't be a salty boi until the game is over, afterwards we can unleash all our salt. Don't post in big text
# [color=darkorange]Example Rolecard[/color] :credit_card: > # [color=green]HTM[/color] > **Town Support** **Scum Slip (Passive)** - All checks against you bring back Mafia Killing results. **Rainbow Lion (Night)** - Dash across the sky, protecting all town members from death tonight. - 2 uses. *Your goal is to see the mafia and any threats to the community eliminated.*
Note, sadly the HTM card will not be in play. It's just an example!
# [color=darkorange]Rolelist[/color] :scroll: ... Dammit, Firekitten ran off with my role list! Looks like we'll have to go without it!
# [color=darkorange]Player List[/color] :tangerine: 1. Firekitten - [color=green]**Icibalus**[/color] - [**Died of Poison D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-night-3-ashe-the-ashe-8-25-alive/62834/4903?u=marluxion) 2. PoisonedSquid - [color=green]**Alfa**[/color] - [**ITA'd D1**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-1-let-the-games-begin-21-24-alive/62834/1010?u=marluxion) 3. Insanity - [color=grey]**Soulshard**[/color] - [**Shot D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-3-insane-in-the-membrane-11-25-alive/62834/4339?u=marluxion) 4. Techwolves - **[color=red]eevee[/color]** - [**Died during an Event D2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-2-guess-whos-back-18-25-alive/62834/3946?u=marluxion) 5. Memesky - **[color=red]PoisonedSquid[/color]** - [**Executed D1**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-1-let-the-games-begin-20-25-alive/62834/3396?u=marluxion) 6. Parfait - [color=green]**OrangeAndBlack5**[/color] - [**Died of Poison D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-night-3-ashe-the-ashe-8-25-alive/62834/4903?u=marluxion) 7. CaptainNerbins - [color=green]**Damafaud**[/color] - [**Shot D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-3-insane-in-the-membrane-10-25-alive/62834/4079?u=marluxion) 8. Celeste_Ludenberg - [color=green]**Moleland**[/color] - [**Died N1**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-night-1-memegrounded-19-25-alive/62834/3400?u=marluxion) 9. Sam17z - **[color=red]Parfait[/color]** - [**Shot D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-3-insane-in-the-membrane-11-25-alive/62834/4324?u=marluxion) 10. NuclearBurrito - [color=green]**Boopydoop**[/color] - [**Shot D1**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-1-let-the-games-begin-21-24-alive/62834/1646?u=marluxion) 11. Simon - [color=green]**Insanity**[/color] - [**Killed N2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-night-2-i-humbly-request-you-die-15-25-alive/62834/4014?u=marluxion) 12. Shurian - **[color=green]NozBugz[/color]** - [**ITA'd D1**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-1-let-the-games-begin-21-24-alive/62834/612?u=marluxion) - Revived! 13. Frostwolf103 - [color=green]**Hippolytus**[/color] - [**ITA'd D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-3-insane-in-the-membrane-10-25-alive/62834/4729?u=marluxion) 14. PokemonKidRyan - [color=grey]**Wolfy**[/color] - [**Lynched D4**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-5-majorly-screwed-5-25-alive/62834/5118?u=marluxion) 15. Pug 16. Moleland 17. Ashe - [color=grey]**Pug**[/color][color=red]**Ashe**[/color] - [**Lynched D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-3-insane-in-the-membrane-9-25-alive/62834/4898?u=marluxion) 18. Hippolytus 19. Livicus - [color=green]**Shurian**[/color] - [**Hung D2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-night-2-i-humbly-request-you-die-15-25-alive/62834/4011?u=marluxion) 20. NozBugz - [color=green]**Marluxion**[/color] - [**Lynched D5**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-5-majorly-screwed-5-25-alive/62834/5157?u=marluxion) 21. MaximusPrime - [color=green]**Firekitten**[/color] - [**ITA'd D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-3-insane-in-the-membrane-10-25-alive/62834/4744?u=marluxion) 22. Icibalus - **[color=green]Frostwolf103[/color]** - [**ITA'd D1**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-1-let-the-games-begin-21-24-alive/62834/532?u=marluxion) 23. Whammerist - **[color=red]Ashe[/color]** - [**ITA'd D1**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-1-let-the-games-begin-21-24-alive/62834/502?u=marluxion) 24. HTM - **[color=red]Methnor[/color]** - [**Dayviged D2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-2-guess-whos-back-18-25-alive/62834/3637?u=marluxion) 25. Damafaud - [color=green]**Whammerist**[/color] - [**Shot D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-community-forum-mafia-day-3-insane-in-the-membrane-11-25-alive/62834/4411?u=marluxion)
Spectators: Twil1ght,

item.title: [FM] FoL Community Forum Mafia - Pug Victory! Who the hell let the dogs out?
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Marluxion:

Parfait died too!

She was…

orangeandblack5

Town Investigator
“Or at least I’m damn sure I’m gonna try” ~ orangeandblack5
Careful Observation (Night) - Investigate a target. You will receive either a “Mafia” or “NS” result.
Mechanics Master (Day) - Publicly reveal a piece of mechanical information regarding the game. - 3 uses.
Grand Strategy (Day) - Tonight, your Careful Observation will also tell you the exact alignment of someone who visited your target. You will not be informed of who, however. - 1 Use.

I only just read this card (didn’t realize I had one before tbh)

It’s hilarious that Parfait rolled me

Read full topic
